channel.description: Recent content in jekyll on Je pense donc je suis

item.title: Setup Jekyll in Windows environment using Docker
item.description: Github provides a great service for technique bloggers: Github Pages. Just by creating a repo in GitHub, we can host a domain like http://username.github.io. And with Jekyll we can write blogs with Markdown and preview blog pages locally and conveniently. The problem for me is that my work environment is Windows, and it’s not easy to install Jekyll in Windows(especially in China). So an idea comes out with me is to use Docker.
